parts.text: {"word":"restituer","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(物を)返す、返却する、返還する","english_definition":"to give back or restore (something lost or stolen) to its proper owner; to return (something) to its original condition.","examples":[{"sentence":"Il faut restituer les objets volés à leurs propriétaires.","translation":"盗まれた物を所有者に返さなければならない。"},{"sentence":"Le musée a restitué les œuvres d'art pillées pendant la guerre.","translation":"美術館は戦時中に略奪された美術品を返還した。"},{"sentence":"Il a restitué l'argent qu'il avait emprunté.","translation":"彼は借りていたお金を返した。"}],"collocations":["restituer un bien (財産を返す)","restituer une œuvre d'art (美術品を返還する)","restituer une somme d'argent (金額を返金する)","restituer dans son état initial (元の状態に戻す)"],"synonyms":["rendre","remettre","restituer à son propriétaire","restituer à l'état original"],"antonyms":["prendre","voler","détériorer"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(権利・地位などを)回復させる、復元する","english_definition":"to restore (someone or something) to a former position or condition.","examples":[{"sentence":"Le roi a été restitué sur son trône.","translation":"王は王位に復帰した。"},{"sentence":"Il faut restituer la vérité historique.","translation":"歴史的真実を回復させなければならない。"},{"sentence":"On a restitué ses droits civiques.","translation":"彼の公民権が回復された。"}],"collocations":["restituer dans ses droits (権利を回復させる)","restituer dans sa fonction (職務に復帰させる)","restituer la vérité (真実を回復させる)"],"synonyms":["rétablir","restaurer","réhabiliter"],"antonyms":["déposséder","destituer","dégrader"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(印象・感情などを)呼び起こす、再現する","english_definition":"to recreate or evoke (a feeling, impression, etc.).","examples":[{"sentence":"Ce film restitue bien l'atmosphère de l'époque.","translation":"この映画は当時の雰囲気をよく再現している。"},{"sentence":"Ses paroles restituent la douleur qu'il a ressentie.","translation":"彼の言葉は彼が感じた痛みを呼び起こす。"}],"collocations":["restituer une ambiance (雰囲気を再現する)","restituer une émotion (感情を呼び起こす)","restituer une impression (印象を再現する)"],"synonyms":["reproduire","évoquer","rappeler"],"antonyms":["dissimuler","masquer"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の *restituere* (再び置く、回復する) から派生。 *re-* (再び) + *statuere* (置く、確立する) が語源。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ʁɛs.ti.tɥe/","syllables":"res-ti-tu-er"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"je restitue","2nd_person_singular":"tu restitues","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on restitue","1st_person_plural":"nous restituons","2nd_person_plural":"vous restituez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles restituent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"je restituais","2nd_person_singular":"tu restituais","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on restituait","1st_person_plural":"nous restituions","2nd_person_plural":"vous restituiez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles restituaient"},"past_historic":{"1st_person_singular":"je restituai","2nd_person_singular":"tu restitua","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on restitua","1st_person_plural":"nous restituâmes","2nd_person_plural":"vous restituâtes","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles restituèrent"},"future":{"1st_person_singular":"je restituerai","2nd_person_singular":"tu restitueras","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on restituera","1st_person_plural":"nous restituerons","2nd_person_plural":"vous restituerez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles restitueront"}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"que je restitue","2nd_person_singular":"que tu restitues","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on restitue","1st_person_plural":"que nous restituions","2nd_person_plural":"que vous restituiez","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles restituent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"que je restituasse","2nd_person_singular":"que tu restituasses","3rd_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on restituât","1st_person_plural":"que nous restituassions","2nd_person_plural":"que vous restituassiez","3rd_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles restituassent"}},"conditional":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"je restituerais","2nd_person_singular":"tu restituerais","3rd_person_singular":"il/elle/on restituerait","1st_person_plural":"nous restituerions","2nd_person_plural":"vous restitueriez","3rd_person_plural":"ils/elles restitueraient"}},"imperative":{"present":{"2nd_person_singular":"restitue","1st_person_plural":"restituons","2nd_person_plural":"restituez"}},"participle":{"present":"restituant","past":"restitué"},"gerund":"en restituant"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"*Restituer* は、何かを元の状態に戻す、または誰かに返すという意味を持つ動詞です。物理的な物（盗まれた物、借りた物）を返す場合、権利や地位を回復させる場合、そして感情や雰囲気を再現する場合など、様々な文脈で使用されます。類似の動詞 *rendre* も「返す」という意味ですが、*restituer* はより公式なニュアンスを持ち、元の状態に戻すというニュアンスが強いです。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Il a restitué le livre à moi.","correct":"Il m'a restitué le livre. / Il a restitué le livre à moi.","note":"*Restituer* は間接目的語を取る場合、代名詞を使う場合は動詞の前に置きます。"},{"incorrect":"Restituer la santé.","correct":"Recouvrer la santé.","note":"健康を回復する場合は *recouvrer* を使うのが一般的です。*Restituer* は、失われたものを返す、というニュアンスが強いです。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["restitution (名詞: 返還、回復)","restituable (形容詞: 返還可能な)"],"priority":"N/A"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"*Restituer* は、何かを元の状態に戻す、または誰かに返すという意味を持つ動詞です。物理的な物、権利、地位、感情、雰囲気など、様々なものを対象とすることができます。類似の動詞 *rendre* と比較して、よりフォーマルで、元の状態に戻すというニュアンスが強いです。法律、歴史、芸術などの分野でよく使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Le gouvernement doit restituer les terres aux peuples autochtones.","translation":"政府は先住民族に土地を返還しなければならない。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"物を返す"},{"sentence":"La justice a restitué son honneur.","translation":"裁判所は彼の名誉を回復させた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"権利を回復させる"},{"sentence":"Ce tableau restitue parfaitement la lumière de la Méditerranée.","translation":"この絵は地中海の光を完璧に再現している。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"印象を再現する"}]}
